summary: This is an email chain from August 18, 2020, regarding discovery in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. A prosecutor or legal representative is following up with the FBI/US Attorney's Office (NY) about missing discovery items, including grand jury transcripts, search warrant returns, FBI files, and digital evidence from seized devices.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.role: Legal staff or recipient of email
persons.context: Mentioned as a recipient of a bounced email and as someone who needs to see an attachment. Likely a member of the legal team.

events.title: Discovery follow-up for Maxwell case
events.description: A legal representative sends a detailed email to the FBI/US Attorney's Office (NY) requesting specific missing discovery materials, including grand jury transcripts, search warrant returns, and digital evidence from seized devices.

keyFacts: The document references a disc labeled as containing grand jury transcripts, indicating such transcripts were part of the discovery materials.
The email requests specific missing items including the 'Full FBI sentinel file', 'CART paperwork' for data extraction, and 'All 302s' regarding data extraction and image review from seized devices.
There is a specific request for scans of all hard copy documents and photos in FBI possession, with special handling for nude or partially nude images (requiring a detailed log instead).
The correspondence highlights ongoing issues with obtaining complete discovery, including search warrant returns for specific warrants (e.g., '20 mag 6719 warrant' and 'NH premises warrant').
